hooks.command: python3 -c "import json, sys; data=json.load(sys.stdin); path=data.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''); blocked=['.env', 'credentials', '.secret', 'package-lock.json', '.git/']; sys.exit(2) if any(p in path for p in blocked) else sys.exit(0)"
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' 2>/dev/null | { read f; [[ "$f" == *.py ]] && ruff check --fix "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; }
osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code awaiting input" with title "Claude Code"' 2>/dev/null || true
